sentences.en: Amazing place he's got there—squash courts, swimming pool, jacuzzi, the works.
sentences.cn: 他的那个地方真是太棒了——壁球场、游泳池、按摩浴池，一应俱全。

sentences.en: He’s an amazing player to watch.
sentences.cn: 看他比赛那才叫精彩呢。

sentences.en: He's prone to flit between subjects with amazing ease.
sentences.cn: 他往往会轻松自如地转换话题。

sentences.en: It was one of the most amazing films I've ever seen.
sentences.cn: 这是我看过的最精彩的电影之一。

sentences.en: It's absolutely amazing, believe you me.
It's amazing how people collect so much stuff over the years.
sentences.cn: 人们竟然日积月累地收集了这么多东西，真令人惊叹。

sentences.en: It's amazing what people will do to get out of paying taxes.
sentences.cn: 人们为逃税而做出的种种事情令人吃惊。

sentences.en: It's amazing what we can re-member with a little prompting.
sentences.cn: 稍加提醒我们就能想起很多东西，真是让人惊奇。

sentences.en: It's really an amazing dance. It just always brings the house down.
sentences.cn: 这真是一段精彩绝伦的舞蹈表演，每次总是博得全场喝彩。

sentences.en: The most amazing thing about nature is its infinite variety.
sentences.cn: 大自然最让人惊叹的是它的无限多样性。

sentences.en: There are an amazing number of commonalities between systems.
sentences.cn: 体制之间有着多得惊人的共性。

sentences.en: Well! Look at that amazing sight!
sentences.cn: 哦! 看那迷人的景色!

sentences.en: What was going through his mind when he spoke those amazing words?
sentences.cn: 他说出那些令人诧异的话时，心里都在想些什么？

sentences.en: You keep on amazing me, year after year, the same old ways.
sentences.cn: 你不断地给我同样的惊喜，年年如此。
